actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To exempt certain deferred compensation plan distributions from the nonincreasing benefits requirement.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an exemption from the nonincreasing benefits requirement of deferred compensation plans of State and local governments and tax-exempt organizations for participants who separated from employment before January 1, 1987.

titles.title: To exempt certain deferred compensation plan distributions from the nonincreasing benefits requirement.
